snippet: Joe Mamola of New Jersey bought his 1964 Ford Fairlane 500 Ranch Wagon three years ago and loves packing his children inside for trips. “It’s an adventure every time we get into the car.”
abstract: Joe Mamola of Wyckoff, NJ, owns 1964 Ford Fairlane 500 Ranch Wagon; Mamola has made hobby of fixing up and selling same model of car, made in year that he was born.
lead_paragraph: Joe Mamola of New Jersey bought his 1964 Ford Fairlane 500 Ranch Wagon three years ago and loves packing his children inside for trips. “It’s an adventure every time we get into the car.”

headline.seo: A Drive in the Suburbs Feels Like a ’60s Vacation
headline.main: Even a Drive in the Suburbs Feels Like a ’60s Vacation
headline.print_headline: Even a Drive in the Suburbs Feels Like a ’60s Vacation
